member.name: M:NReco.Dsm.WebForms.ControlUtils.GetChildren``1(System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Returns control childres of specified type.
member.remarks: This method performs breadth-first search (that can avoid full subtree traversal for some cases) and doesn't uses much memory even for huge subtrees.
